text: Villeneuve-en-Perseigne is a commune in the Sarthe department in the Pays de la Loire region in north-western France. It was formed on 1 January 2015 by the merger of the former communes La Fresnaye-sur-Chédouet, Chassé, Lignières- la-Carelle, Montigny, Roullée and Saint-Rigomer-des-Bois.Arrêté préfectoral 22 September 2014 ==See also== *Communes of the Sarthe department ==References== Category:Communes of Sarthe
title: Villeneuve-en-Perseigne
